connector.description: Send Data to an Azure CosmosDB instance

camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-sink.databa.name: camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-sink.databaseEndpoint
camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-sink.databa.description: Sets the Azure Cosmos database endpoint the component will connect to.

camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-sink.itemPa.name: camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-sink.itemPartitionKey
camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-sink.itemPa.description: Represents a partition key value in the Azure Cosmos DB database service. A partition key identifies the partition where the item is stored in.

camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-sink.creden.name: camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-sink.credentialType
camel.kamelet.azure-cosmosdb-sink.creden.description: Determines the credential strategy to adopt.
